headline: Video Processing Platform Markets: Video Encoding & Transcoding, Video Management,Video Ingest & Capture, Video Delivery & Distribution, Video Editing & Enhancement - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: Key drivers include the increasing demand for short-form, platform-specific video content and OTT services expanding global video consumption. The adoption of advanced video codecs enhances traffic management efficiency. Notably, video personalization and recommendation engines are projected to experience the highest growth, reflecting growing consumer interest in tailored experiences. Live streaming will dominate the market due to rising real-time content demand. North America leads with cuttin
